explains: n. 匹配，相称；比赛，竞赛

sentences.en: Each matchup is represented by a element.
sentences.cn: 每场比赛由一个元素表示。

sentences.en: This is the matchup the Heat wanted all along.
sentences.cn: 这是热火队一直想要的比赛。

sentences.en: "Hey, I'm not down about that," he said of the matchup with Howard.
sentences.cn: 谈到与霍华德的交手，姚明说：“嘿，我并不担心与霍华德交手。
